definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: How much sales has music handsets brought for Nokia in 2006?
sentences.chinese: 2006年諾基亞音樂手機帶來的銷售額有多大？

sentences.english: A lot of rock stars started out playing in garage bands before they got big.
sentences.chinese: 許多著名的搖滾樂手是從車庫樂隊起家的。

sentences.english: Ren Jie, video maker and bandsman, lives in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 任傑，錄像製作者，樂手，現居北京。

sentences.english: I encourage oboe and clarinet players to use plenty of vibrato .
sentences.chinese: 我鼓勵演奏雙簧管和單簧管的樂手們多使用顫音。

sentences.english: The musicians started to beat small drums.
He is a musician and church building committee member of Canaan Baptist Church.
sentences.chinese: 他是迦南浸信會的樂手及建堂委員會成員。

sentences.english: Musicians played and pet owners dressed their dogs in anti-nuclear vests.
sentences.chinese: 樂手們奏樂，寵物主人讓自己的狗穿上反核建馬甲。

sentences.english: These are musicians on the floats playing the "Welcome spring music" at the Flower Festival.
sentences.chinese: 這是花節上的樂手在彩車上演奏“迎春曲”。

sentences.english: They put an advertisement in a newspaper looking for rock musicians.
sentences.chinese: 他們在報紙上登了一則廣告，想招搖滾樂手。

sentences.english: The singer of a famous Rock Band, he is an important character of the Rock circle.
sentences.chinese: 某著名樂隊主唱，搖滾圈中舉足輕重的樂手。

sentences.english: All the walls of his room are decorated with pictures of rock singers.
sentences.chinese: 他房間的牆上貼滿了搖滾樂手的照片。

sentences.english: LG has a new slim slider music phone, the KV5900.
sentences.chinese: LG發佈了一款新型超薄滑蓋音樂手機KV5900。

sentences.english: Close the door after you, please.
sentences.chinese: 請隨手步步高音樂手機價格關門。

sentences.english: Why are music phones less successful than the iPod?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼音樂手機沒有iPod成功？

sentences.english: Has Nokia music handset brand strategy met expected effect?
sentences.chinese: 諾基亞音樂手機品牌戰略是否達到了預計效果呢？

sentences.english: He is an experienced instrumental performer, and a master of accompaniment techniques.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個有經驗的樂手，深通伴奏技巧。

definition: speaking and singing, as in various forms of storytelling such as 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2] and 相聲|相声[xiang4 sheng5]/(music) rapping
